articles.author: M. Sriram, Dhwani Pandya
articles.title: Indians get hooked on 10-minute grocery apps, squeezing small retailers - Reuters.com
articles.description: In a middle-class suburb of Mumbai, workers at SoftBank-backed Swiggy's grocery warehouse race against time to deliver orders within 10 minutes. Their speed is tracked by the seconds on a screen that flashes red warnings for slowness.

articles.description: Now that Ram Mohan Naidu has taken charge as aviation minister, NRIs are requesting him to fulfill their wish of bringing Emirates flights from Dubai to Gannavaram.
